Question: What are the Advantages of buying a property in Abu Dhabi?
Answer: The Advantages of buying a property in Abu Dhabi are High level of wages, No income tax, High level of security, Sunshine all year round, Sea and beaches, Optimal work-life balance.

Question: How the ownership of properties work for foreigners?
Answer: The ownership of properties work for foreigners in this way - The system has moved to free ownership, so foreign investors can now become full owners and receive an authentic ownership document of confirmation. As a result, buying a property in Abu Dhabi has become more secure.
